1.name: Spider-Man
1.description: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

2.name: Signs
2.description: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

3.name: 28 Days Later...
3.description: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

4.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
4.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

5.name: Catch Me If You Can
5.description: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully forged millions of dollars' worth of checks while posing as a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.

6.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
6.description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

7.name: Gangs of New York
7.description: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

8.name: Secretary
8.description: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.

9.name: The Pianist
9.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

10.name: Cidade de Deus
10.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

11.name: Irréversible
11.description: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.

12.name: Road to Perdition
12.description: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

13.name: Scooby-Doo
13.description: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

14.name: Chicago
14.description: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

15.name: The Count of Monte Cristo
15.description: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

16.name: Unfaithful
16.description: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

17.name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
17.description: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala, while Obi-Wan Kenobi investigates an assassination attempt on the senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

18.name: Men in Black II
18.description: Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.

19.name: Minority Report
19.description: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

20.name: The Ring
20.description: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

21.name: 8 Mile
21.description: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

22.name: Resident Evil
22.description: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

23.name: A Walk to Remember
23.description: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

24.name: The Time Machine
24.description: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

25.name: Insomnia
25.description: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

26.name: xXx
26.description: An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.

27.name: The Bourne Identity
27.description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

28.name: Panic Room
28.description: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

29.name: Punch-Drunk Love
29.description: A psychologically troubled novelty supplier is nudged towards a romance with an English woman, all the while being extorted by a phone-sex line run by a crooked mattress salesman, and purchasing stunning amounts of pudding.

30.name: Lilo & Stitch
30.description: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.

31.name: Red Dragon
31.description: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

32.name: About a Boy
32.description: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

33.name: Cabin Fever
33.description: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

34.name: Ghost Ship
34.description: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

35.name: Blade II
35.description: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

36.name: Equilibrium
36.description: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

37.name: Die Another Day
37.description: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

38.name: The Hours
38.description: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

39.name: Adaptation.
39.description: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

40.name: Frida
40.description: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

41.name: Star Trek: Nemesis
41.description: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.

42.name: Ice Age
42.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

43.name: Mr. Deeds
43.description: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

44.name: Ken Park
44.description: Ken Park is about several Californian skateboarders' lives and relationships with and without their parents.

45.name: Treasure Planet
45.description: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

46.name: We Were Soldiers
46.description: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

47.name: Sweet Home Alabama
47.description: A young woman who's reinvented herself as a New York City socialite must return home to Alabama to obtain a divorce from her husband, after seven years of separation.

48.name: The Mothman Prophecies
48.description: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

49.name: The Rules of Attraction
49.description: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

50.name: Sweet Sixteen
50.description: Determined to have a normal family life once his mother gets out of prison, a Scottish teenager from a tough background sets out to raise the money for a home.
